Package zuul.commands

Class Command

java.lang.Object
zuul.commands.Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
DropCommand, GiveCommand, GoCommand, HelpCommand, LookCommand, QuitCommand, TakeCommand
public abstract class Command
extends java.lang.Object
A Command for the "World of Zuul" application. This class holds information about a command that was issued by the user. A command consists of two parts: a command word and a list of modifier words (for example, if the user input was "take map", then the command state would be commandWord = "take" and modifiers = {"map"}).

The way this is used is: Commands are already checked for being valid command words. If the user entered an invalid command (a word that is not known) then then no command word should be created.

If the command does not require modifiers then modifiers can be null.

    private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> MODIFIERS

  • Field Details

    • COMMAND_WORD

      private final java.lang.String COMMAND_WORD
      The first word of a user-entered command

    • MODIFIERS

      private final java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> MODIFIERS

  • Constructor Details

    • Command

      public Command​(java.lang.String commandWord, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> modifiers)
      Creates a command object. Command word must be supplied but modifiers may be null.
      Parameters:
      commandWord - the first word of the command, not null
      modifiers - the array of modifier words to the command word. Empty or null if no modifiers input.

    • Command

      public Command​(java.lang.String commandWord)
      Creates a command object with only Command word supplied.

      Sets modifiers to an empty list.

      Parameters:
      commandWord - the first word of the command, not null

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public boolean execute​(Character character)
      Executes this command on the specified Character.

      Informs the GameInterface that a command has started before running the command logic of this command.

      Informs the GameInterface that a command has ended after running the command logic of this command.

      Parameters:
      character - the character that is acting on this command, not null
      Returns:
      true if the command executed successfully, false otherwise

    • updateErr

      protected void updateErr​(java.lang.String error)
      Informs the GameInterface that an error has occurred during the executing of this command.

      Includes the commandWord of this command and the specified specific error message.

      Parameters:
      error - the specific error message, not null

    • commandLogic

      protected abstract boolean commandLogic​(Character character)
      The command logic of this command. This is run when execute(Character) is called.
      Parameters:
      character - the character that is acting on this command, not null
      Returns:
      true if the command logic completes successfully, false otherwise

    • getModifier

      public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getModifier​(int i)
      Gets the modifier word in the specified index of MODIFIERS. Can handle indexes outside of the size of MODIFIERS of this command.
      Parameters:
      i - the index to check for a modifier word
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the modifier in the specified index if it exists, empty Optional otherwise

    • hasModifiers

      public boolean hasModifiers()
      Indicates if this command has at least one modifier word in MODIFIERS.
      Returns:
      true if command has at least one modifier word, false otherwise

    • hasModifier

      public boolean hasModifier​(int i)
      Indicates if this command has a non-null modifier in the specified index of MODIFIERS.
      Parameters:
      i - the index to check
      Returns:
      true if MODIFIERS has an index i and a non-null modifier word exists in that index, false otherwise.
